channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Membership
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Membership

item.title: CVE-2022-1724|2024-08-03T00:16:58.963Z -- unknown -- simple%20membership
item.description: The Simple Membership WordPress plugin before 4.1.1 does not properly sanitise and escape parameters before outputting them back in AJAX actions, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

item.title: CVE-2022-2273|2024-08-03T00:32:09.608Z -- unknown -- simple%20membership
item.description: The Simple Membership WordPress plugin before 4.1.3 does not properly validate the membership_level parameter when editing a profile, allowing members to escalate to a higher membership level by using a crafted POST request.

item.title: CVE-2022-2317|2024-08-03T00:32:09.549Z -- unknown -- simple%20membership
item.description: The Simple Membership WordPress plugin before 4.1.3 allows user to change their membership at the registration stage due to insufficient checking of a user supplied parameter.
